tag_list: travelling, langkawi, malaysia, bangkok, thailand, laos, seo, travels, working-in-thailand
overview:
Travel writer and online marketing expert currently based in Bangkok, Thailand.

I started travelling back in 2000 - visiting SE Asia, Australia and New Zealand. The bug hit and I have been back many times since. I now live in Bangkok with my husband, who is originally from Sweden.

We started our trip in Langkawi, Oct 2011. Then travelled to KL then onward to Thailand and Laos.
